title: Malta Apostille Services in Delhi NCR
description:
If you're planning to study, work, or settle in Malta, it is essential to get your Indian documents apostilled for legal use. Since Malta is a member of the Hague Apostille Convention, documents issued in India must be apostilled by the Ministry of External Affairs (MEA) to be valid in Malta—there’s no need for embassy attestation. We offer fast, reliable, and affordable Malta apostille services in Delhi NCR, helping you complete the documentation process smoothly and quickly.
Whether you need a birth certificate apostille for Malta for family reunification or a degree certificate apostille for Malta for higher education or employment purposes, our professional team ensures a seamless experience. We also handle apostille for PCC (Police Clearance Certificate) and other personal and educational documents with utmost accuracy. If you’re searching for MEA apostille services near me, or specifically need Malta apostille in Delhi, we’re your trusted partner.
From students applying for universities to professionals moving on a work visa or families relocating to Malta, we’ve helped hundreds of clients get their Indian documents apostilled for Malta. Our team is experienced with the MEA protocols and offers end-to-end support from verification to delivery. With our apostille service for Malta in India, you can focus on your relocation while we handle your paperwork
requirements: Free document pickup & delivery across Delhi NCR
Apostille for all types of documents—personal, educational, and commercial
process: Pre-verification from the relevant state authority / SDM / Chamber of Commerce
Final Document Delivery – Valid in Malta without further embassy legalization
note: No embassy attestation required for Malta, as it's part of the Hague Convention.
documentsRequired: Birth certificates, Marriage certificates, Divorce Decree, Affidavits, etc
Degree certificate, Diploma certificate, Marksheet, etc
Power of Attorney, Certificate of Incorporation, Agreements, etc
